ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:51:19 [Issue ID 4000-575890] urn:comicvine:4000-575890 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 21:30:36. [Issue ID 1665623]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Godeater has defeated the Hosts of Heaven, the Armies of Hell, and the warriors of Valhalla. The end of all things is here, unless Ernie can destroy something that can’t be destroyed. It’s the fearsome finale to Justin Jordan’s Chaos Comics epic… and perhaps the most senses-shattering event in Ernest Fairchild’s un-life! Meanwhile, our “Last Ditch Bitch” back-up series comes to its explosive conclusion, as Chastity and Mistress Hel throw down over the fate of singer Liv Halvorsen!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------------|-----------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Lucio Parrillo | 1 | | B | Cover B | Ben Templesmith | 2 | | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Ben Templesmith | 3 |
Notes:
Cover A is a homage of the Virtruvian Man.
